## dateTimeValueFormatter() function

Format a date time value to a readable string.

**Signature:**

```typescript

```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |

**Returns:**

The filter params.

## Remarks

Formats \[DATETIME\] UNIX Timestamps (with time) to readable strings
